quoteText: You agree that you will indemnify and hold Ancestry, our employees, and our agents harmless from any claims, damages, or other expenses (including attorney's fees) that result from your use of the Services
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
